in a way that relates to the act or process of mitosis (= a type of cell division): divide mitotically During the growth period, the cells divide mitotically.mitotically active Mitotically active germ cells were present in the ovaries of the mice.
More examplesFewer examplesThese mitotically dividing cells are called stem cells.The ovaries contain a stock of mitotically multiplying cells.These are the most malignant and mitotically active tumours. The virus can infect both mitotically active and non-dividing cells.The cell duplicates mitotically to form an exact replica.
